attributes.action: Make The Punishment For A Crime To Be Enough Of A Deterrent To Deter The Crime From Ever Being Committed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recently been a victim of 2 Crimes, both of which have been commited by youth's who persistently offened. They know that they will not be sent to a Youth Detention Center and thay know adults canot touch them, as we would end up in Prison. Why are these people still allowed on our streets. The goverment needs to take IMMEDIATE ACTION to make any person who commit's a crime realise that the penalty for such an act will result in a loss of their freedom.
